software.description:
Sinoplan is a powerful software designed for planning of stereotactic implantation surgery, such as depth electrodes(SEEG) or DBS, It is also an useful neuroimaging tool.
Main functions:
Multi-model image fusion.
Automatic image registration;
3D reconstruction and visualization of Vessel, skin, cranial and bone;
Easily trajectory planning and viewing, 8-16pins electrode avaliable.
Calibration of the parameter of stereotactics frame, support both crw and leksell.

Working environment:
System: Windows 10 (64bits)
CPU: Intel Core i7
Memory: 8G
Graphic: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050M or higher is recommended
Network connection required.

Attention:
For intellectual property protection reason, this software must be worked in network environment and online verification may be required during operation. Users can use most of the software's features and register via email to access all functions.
If have any questions or want to report bugs, feel free to leave us messages through forum or contact lz@sinovationmed.com.
